steps.content:
Maize is Ethiopia’s most important cereal in terms of production.

Maize is Ethiopia’s most important cereal in terms of production.

94% of maize production is done by smallholder farmers.

Since 1981, the rainfall during the short rainy season has increased by as much as 10% per year.

11.7% of the area currently used for maize production has been impacted by this increase.
